member.name: T:BaGet.Azure.AzureBlobStorageOptions

member.summary: The Azure Blob Storage connection string. If provided, ignores and .

member.name: F:BaGet.Azure.AzureSearchBatchIndexer.MaxBatchSize
member.summary: Azure Search accepts batches of up to 1000 documents.

member.name: T:BaGet.Azure.ExactMatchCustomAnalyzer
member.summary: A custom analyzer for case insensitive exact match.

member.name: P:BaGet.Azure.PackageDocument.Version
member.summary: The package's full versions after normalization, including any SemVer 2.0.0 build metadata.

member.name: P:BaGet.Azure.PackageDocument.Versions
member.summary: The package's full versions after normalization, including any SemVer 2.0.0 build metadata.

member.name: F:BaGet.Azure.SearchFilters.IncludePrerelease
member.summary: Include packages that have prerelease versions. Note that a package's dependency version ranges do not affect the prerelease status of the package. This is in contrast of .

member.name: F:BaGet.Azure.SearchFilters.IncludeSemVer2
member.summary: Include SemVer 2.0.0 packages. Note that SemVer 2.0.0 dependency version ranges make a package into a SemVer 2.0.0 even if the package's own version string is SemVer 1.0.0.

member.name: F:BaGet.Azure.SearchFilters.IncludePrereleaseAndSemVer2
member.summary: Include package that have prerelease versions and include SemVer 2.0.0 packages.
